desc.p: Fields FIELD to FILE form a related multi value set.
A maximum of 32 characters may be entered.
Fields FIELD to FILE form a related multi value set.
A maximum of 32 characters may be entered.
This field name has been amended to FILE. Kindly refer the HelpText of FILE.
This field specifies a field join.
Minimum one character and a maximum of 50 characters is allowed.
